Create the AMP-story standalone boilerpl.description: Creates the standalone boilerplate for an AMP story with two pages, each containing two layers, and the bookend.

Create an AMP story page.description: Creates an AMP story page. Enter a numeric value in the id corresponding to page's position.

Create an AMP story grid layer.description: Creates an AMP story grid layer. This tag goes within the amp-story-page. Enter a template value like fill, vertical, horizontal, thirds to arrange child tags within the layer.

Create a call to action in AMP story.description: Creates an AMP story call to action. Use this to invite users to press a button and follow a link. This layer will align itself to the bottom and occupies 20% height.

Create the AMP story bookend.description: Creates a bookend at the bottom of AMP story for credits, links and sharing options. Use a JSON in the src field to insert content, or place script tag within the bookend.

Create an AMP Story page attachment.description: Creates a page attachment, activated by swiping up or clicking a prompt. Place this after closing preceding amp-story-grid-layer.
